class.name: DiscordAudioDevice
class.brief_description: Represents a single input or output audio device available to the user.
class.description: Discord will initialize the audio engine with the system default input and output devices. You can change the device through the <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1Client" kindref="compound">Client</ref> by passing the id of the desired audio device.

method.name: equals
method.description: Compares the ID of two <ref refid="classdiscordpp_1_1AudioDevice" kindref="compound">AudioDevice</ref> objects for equality.

method.name: id
method.description: The ID of the audio device.

method.name: is_default
method.description: Whether the audio device is the system default device.

method.name: name
method.description: The display name of the audio device.
